# afenda-ui

Package providing **main exports (barrel from index)**. Import from `afenda-ui` in workspace packages.

## Package Overview

ğŸ“ 6 directory areas

### What's Inside

- **Main exports (barrel from index)**
- **React components**
- **React hooks**

### Directory Structure

```
â”œâ”€â”€ src/
    â”œâ”€â”€ components/ â€” React UI components (61 files)
    â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/ â€” React hooks (21 files)
    â”œâ”€â”€ lib/ â€” Library and shared code (10 files)
    â””â”€â”€ providers/ (4 files)
â””â”€â”€ engine/ â€” Core engine or pipeline logic (1 file)
```

### Source Layout

- **`components/`** â€” React UI components
- **`engine/`** â€” Core engine or pipeline logic
- **`hooks/`** â€” React hooks
- **`lib/`** â€” Library and shared code

### Entry Points

- `src/index.ts` â€” barrel export
- `src/providers/index.ts` â€” barrel export

```bash

```

This package requires the following peer dependencies:

- `react`
- `react-dom`
- `tailwindcss`

## Exports

| Subpath | Conditions |
|---|---|
| `.` | import: `./dist/index.mjs`, require: `./dist/index.js`, types: `./dist/index.d.ts` |
| `./components/*` | default: `./src/components/*.tsx` |
| `./hooks/*` | default: `./src/hooks/*.ts` |
| `./lib/*` | default: `./src/lib/*.ts` |
| `./providers` | default: `./src/providers/index.tsx` |
| `./providers/*` | default: `./src/providers/*.tsx` |
| `./styles/*` | default: `./src/styles/*.css` |

## Architecture

UI library. Components and hooks live under `src/`. Import from the package name in apps.

3. Run `pnpm type-check` to verify types

## shadcn/ui Integration

This package uses [shadcn/ui](https://ui.shadcn.com) as the component primitive
layer, with the afenda Tailwind Engine providing the design tokens (colors,
spacing, typography, etc.).

### Architecture

```
Layer 1: Tailwind Engine (DNA)
  â””â”€ tailwindengine.json â†’ engine/generate.ts â†’ CSS tokens (@theme)

Layer 2: Bridge (src/styles/globals.css)
  â””â”€ Maps engine tokens â†’ shadcn semantic variables (--primary, --border, etc.)

Layer 3: shadcn/ui Components (Organs)
  â””â”€ Accessible, headless primitives styled via semantic variables
```

### Directory Structure

```
packages/ui/src/
â”œâ”€â”€ components/       â† shadcn primitives (button, card, dialog, etc.)
â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/            â† shadcn hooks (use-mobile, etc.)
â”œâ”€â”€ lib/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils.ts      â† cn() utility
â”œâ”€â”€ styles/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ globals.css   â† Bridge: engine tokens â†’ shadcn semantic vars
â””â”€â”€ index.ts          â† Barrel exports
```

### Adding New Components

From the monorepo root:

```bash
# Add a single component
pnpm ui:add accordion

# Add multiple components
pnpm ui:add accordion alert-dialog avatar

# Or run directly from packages/ui
pnpm dlx shadcn@latest add accordion
```

The CLI installs components into `src/components/`, adds Radix dependencies to
`package.json`, and resolves imports automatically.

**After adding**, update the barrel export in `src/index.ts`:

```ts
export * from './components/accordion';
```

### Updating Components (Sync from Upstream)

```bash
# Check what changed upstream
pnpm ui:diff

# Overwrite with latest upstream version (review diff first!)
pnpm ui:update accordion
```

| Component      | File                | Radix Primitive |
| -------------- | ------------------- | --------------- |
| Button         | `button.tsx`        | `Slot`          |
| Card           | `card.tsx`          | â€”               |

### Remaining Components (Install on Demand)

Accordion, Alert, Alert Dialog, Aspect Ratio, Avatar, Badge, Breadcrumb,
Calendar, Carousel, Chart, Checkbox, Collapsible, Combobox, Command, Context
Menu, Data Table, Date Picker, Direction, Drawer, Empty, Field, Hover Card,
Input Group, Input OTP, Item, Kbd, Menubar, Native Select, Navigation Menu,
Pagination, Popover, Progress, Radio Group, Resizable, Scroll Area, Separator,
Sheet, Sidebar, Skeleton, Slider, Spinner, Switch, Table, Textarea, Toggle,
Toggle Group, Typography

### Key Principles

- **Open Code** â€” shadcn components are copied into your codebase, not imported
  from `node_modules`. You own them.
- **Modify Freely** â€” Edit component files directly to match your design system.
- **JIT Install** â€” Only add components when you need them to keep the bundle
  clean.
- **Engine First** â€” All colors/tokens come from the Tailwind Engine. The bridge
  layer maps them to shadcn's expected CSS variables.
